info.task: navigate to cell containing link on next row in grid
info.title: Navigate to a cell containing a link on the next row in a grid in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstLinkedCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the third cell of the second row in the grid

user: From a cell containing a link, navigate to the next row in the grid.
instructions.raw: From a cell containing a link, navigate to the next row in the grid.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Description') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 3, row 3) are conveyed
